alert.note: Alert for Deuel (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Aberdeen (Northern and Northeastern South Dakota)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 20 at 7:18PM MDT until June 20 at 8:00PM MDT by NWS Aberdeen
info.description: The National Weather Service in Aberdeen has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Deuel County in northeastern South Dakota... * Until 900 PM CDT. * At 818 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Bruce to 6 miles south of Hendricks, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Severe thunderstorms will be near... Brandt around 835 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of these severe thunderstorms include Lake Cochrane Rec Area and Gary. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
